name.zh: 建築資訊模型與防救災及工程管理
name.en: Applications of Building Information Modeling for Disaster Prevention and Engineering Management

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠經由防救災或工程管理之需求分析開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而設計一個BIM在防救災與管理之實務應用，其內容包括：BIM自動化防救災應用，BIM實務應用，國內外BIM案例探討，BIM應用之分析與設計，BIM系統設計與開發，BIM系統在防救災與工程管理之應用等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for applications disaster prevention and management recently. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, development, and related applications for disaster prevention and engineering management. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments, a midterm report and a final project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related applications suitable to their own researches to meet disaster prevention or engineering management requirement.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二106級必修(台北校區為主)

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

description.zh: 隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，我們已經處於大數據時代，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與分析大數據、如何更進一步從大數據分析發展市場行銷與顧客關係管理策略，大數據各種案例實務探討等。
description.en: With the development of cloud computing services and Internet services, it has generated a very huge amount of data. How to handle and store these big data and how to mine useful knowledge from big data have become the popular research topics. The contents of this course also include how to handle and store big data, and how to develop marketing and customer relationship management strategies thru big data analysis, and various big data practices and case studies.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 物聯網能讓所有能行使獨立功能的普通物體實作互聯互通的網路，在物聯網上，每個人都可以應用電子標籤將真實的物體上網聯結，在物聯網上都可以查出它們的具體位置。通過物聯網可以用中心電腦對機器、裝置、人員進行集中管理、控制，也可以對家庭裝置、汽車進行遙控，以及搜尋位置、防止物品被盜等，類似自動化操控系統，同時透過收集這些小事的資料，最後可以整合成大數據。物聯網將現實世界數位化，應用範圍十分廣泛，包括運輸和物流領域、健康醫療領域範圍、智慧環境（家庭、辦公、工廠）領域、個人和社會領域等，具有十分廣闊的市場和應用前景。本課程將介紹物聯網基本概念、相關技術與應用。
description.en: The Internet of Things (IoT) is the network of physical objects—devices, vehicles, buildings and other items — embedded with electronics, software, sensors, and network connectivity that enables these objects to collect and exchange data. The IoT allows objects to be sensed and controlled remotely across existing network infrastructure, creating opportunities for more direct integration of the physical world into computer-based systems, and resulting in improved efficiency, accuracy and economic benefit. In this course, concepts, technologies and applications of IoT will be introduced.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到17世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 本課程是為非電影系的大專學生所設計的，希望在一個學期的課程中，能使學生對電影藝術有概括的了解。課程包括電影原理與形式美學、電影史、以及電影理論；以影片(某段時期的作品)與形式分析交互進行。上課方式為：講課、影片觀賞與討論，所觀賞的影片兼及經典與當代作品，例如：卓別林、希區考克、史匹柏、珍康萍等導演的作品。本課程的重點在原理的說明和理論的探討，使學生能以新的角度解讀電影，具有深度評析電影的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to give non-film major college students a comprehensive understanding of film within one semester.  The goal of the course is to provide a survey of some major topics in cinema studies which are organized into three sections: film production and techniques, history, and criticism and theory.  Course activities include lectures, film/video screenings, and discussions.  Not only classic but also contemporary works will be screened, such as the films of Charles Chaplin, Serger Eisesnsten, Alfred Hitchcock, Steven Spielberg, Jane Campion and David Cronenberg. Although the course will focus primarily on theory, discussion are welcome.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 海洋環境是人類賴以生存和發展的自然環境的重要組成 部分，包括海洋水體、海底和海面上空的大氣，以及與海洋密切相關，並受到海洋影響的沿岸和河口區域。海洋環境問題的產生，主要是人們在開發利用海洋的過程中，沒有考慮海洋 環境的承受能力，低估了自然界的反作用，使海洋環境受到不同程度的損壞。首先是向海洋排放污染物；其次是某些不合理的海岸工程建設，給海洋環境帶來的嚴重影響；第三是對水產資源的濫捕，對紅樹林、珊瑚礁的亂伐亂採，也危及到生態平衡。上述問題的存在已對人類生產和生活均構成了嚴重威脅。為此，海洋環境保護問題已成為當今全球關注的熱點之一 。本課題是當今全世界共同關心的課題之一，網路資訊眾多，從聯合國環境署（UNEP）、美國海洋大氣總署（NOAA）及Green Peace Marine Conservation等眾多推廣，培養學生的海洋倫理意識並與海洋生態保育的理念接軌是本課程目標。
description.en: The marine environment is an important part of mankind's survival and development of the natural environment, including marine waters, seabed and over the sea, the atmosphere, and is closely related with the ocean, and by the marine influence coastal and estuarine areas. Generation of marine environmental issues, people in the process of development and utilization of the ocean, without considering the capacity of the marine environment, underestimated the nature of the reaction, the marine environment are subject to different degrees of damage. The first is the discharge of pollutants to the ocean; followed by some unreasonable Coastal Construction, the serious impact to the marine environment; aquatic resources from over-exploitation, the indiscriminate logging Luancai mangroves, coral reefs, and also endangering the ecological balance. The presence of the above problems pose a serious threat to human life and production. For this reason, the issue of protection of the marine environ

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養學生具備有關健康的知識，以度過健康的一生。為達成此目標，本課程提供學生四方面內容。一、健康與人生概述，包括人生的意義，健康的境界，認識自己的身體；二、生理健康之道，包括健康的飲食門道，體重控制與運動處方，學習終身修練的功夫，用葯知識；三、心理健康之道，包括健康的人格發展，情緒管理，健康的人際關係，健康的性，健康的家庭生活，健康地面對老化與死亡；四、健康的生活環境，包括物理、化學與生物的環境，健康的職場生活，健康的休閒生活等。本課程除講授法外，並用影片、討論、個別習作等方式教學。
description.en: This subject is to cultivate the students to be full of health knowlodge and to lead them have healthy and happy lives, For getting this object this course offers the students with four arear of knowledge. First, the introduction:including meaning of life, significacne of health, know oneself's body. Second, the ways for getting physical health including food and types of nutrients, determining desirable weight, principles of exercise programs, learning a life-long Kun fu, medical use of drugs. Third, the ways for getting mental health:including good development of personality, management of emotion, good interpersoal relationship, healthful sexuality, happy family life, coming to terms with aging and death. Fourth, healthful environment:including physical, chemical and biological environment, professional, socia and leisured lives of suitability. For most effective learning, the metho of video,discuss and indivdual practice teaching are as well used as the lecture.

description.zh: 本課程主要是分析當前交通事故、企業犯罪、暴力犯罪、性犯罪、網路犯罪、信用卡犯罪、詐欺犯罪、洗錢犯罪等的原因與手法，學習保護自己生命、財產等的因應作為；並針對上述各類型的犯罪實例，探討避免自己成為犯人或被害人的具體做法。
description.en: The main topics for class discussion include the causes and effects of the crimes on:  traffic accidents, enterprise interactions, violence, sexes, internet, credit cards, frauds and money washing.  Lessons are learned so that the students know how to protect their lives and rights. Through the class discussion on the topics above, the students are prompted to find out some practical strategies to avoid committing crimes or being a criminal victim.

notes: 社哲向度3月2日後調至三教303上課

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 古蹟、歷史建築和聚落為台灣地區文化資產的一部份，亦是台灣社會發展和多元文化交融的歷史見證。這些建築物表出各項的歷史價值與意義，其類型包括了史前遺址、荷西城堡、清代祠廟、墳墓、民居，以及日治時代以後的官署、學校、官舍住宅、土木設施等。本課程的目的，一方面希望讓修課同學對台灣各期建築歷史與形式風格特徵，能有清晰的架構與認識，以作為欣賞台灣古蹟的基礎；另一方面則是養成同學對身處文化環境的關心與歷史人文精神的培養。
description.en: Cultural property, historic building and settlement are the evidence of history development and multiple cultural interaction of Taiwanese society. The types of architecture include excavation, castle, temple, tomb, folk settlement before the Ching dynasty, and official building, school, house and civil engineering facility after the Japanese occupied period. This course hope to help students to understand the architectural history briefly, and get some basic skill about the formative characters of each period. Furthermore, it will train them to give more concern on the cultural environment of Taiwan.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 本課程，擬引領修課同學們徜徉古今愛情文學作品；內容含括詩、詞、散文、小說、戲曲、視聽影像等，並以主題單元方式進行之。從中，仔細咀嚼或清澀曖昧、或清新動人、或可歌可泣、或刻骨銘心、或纏綿悱惻、或黯然銷魂的愛情文學作品；從中，與作品中所傳達的心情、心事、心聲產生共鳴，由此來發現：在塵世的繁華裡，情感的傳遞是沒有時空隔閡，是可以心心相映。鑑於修課同學正值青春年華、正將展翅翱翔，因此本課程除了鑑賞、品味古今愛情文學作品，並欲與吾人現實人生作一連結，由此思考愛情、婚姻、兩性、家國、社會、政治等議題，由此尋求愛情的本質與真諦。
description.en: The course to be taught to lead students know the love of ancient and modern literature; content encompasses poems, prose, fiction, drama, music, video works, etc., and will be conducted in a manner theme unit. From this, clear astringent taste ambiguous, fresh and moving, epic, unforgettable, deeply grieved and other types of love literature. In the process, the works convey mood, thoughts, aspirations, etc. to produce spiritual resonance. Thus to discover: In dust, there is no time and space to pass emotional estrangement, is matched heart.As the students is young, will start his life being so understanding of the course in addition to the love of ancient and modern literature, and our desire to make a real life connection. Thus thinking love, marriage, gender, home country, society, politics and other topics. Thus, the nature and essence of seeking love.

name.zh: 兒童文學融入英語教學
name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

notes: 限學號雙數號學生選課

description.zh: 使用者導向之設計已成為大多數互動設計的依循主軸。他翻轉了以產品為導向的傳統，強調以使用者的偏好引領設計的價值。而這就是設計思考的方法導入互動設計中，利用其敏感性和方法，透過可行及可用的技術滿足使用者的需求，從而產生使用者價值並發展市場機會。研究建議，由世界級的設計公司IDEO所主導，設計思考與決策科學相結合，觸發了同理心設計與工程技術的融合。這不僅可以確保提出兼容實際性和創造性地問題解決方案外，而且在設計的開始便融入使用者導向的設計概念，將有助於創新設計與解決方案的提出。同時，在設計的初始階段導入資料應用與分析的方法，更能在設計中正確的整合敏感性，技術可行性，商轉可行性和使用者的需求。本課程主要的概念在於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者及其需求作為設計提案以及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象，使用者所遭遇的問題，以及如何提高性能以及實現可擴展性等問題。並透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。因此，本課程的主要目標是：1.建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2.使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，
description.en: As the user-center design is becoming the core of most interaction design (IxD), it has become a popular belief that it is no longer the product that leads but users and user preferences that's leading the game. This is where design thinking steps in, where IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. Suggested by some studies, brought in vogue by the popular design firm IDEO, design thinking when combined with decision science results in an infusion of empathy with engineering. This not only ensures a practical and creative resolution of problems but also puts the user at the center of applications and at the starting point to develop new designs and solutions. Meanwhile, ensuring design in analytics projects from the initial stages can lead to the right blend of sensibility, technical feasibility, business viability, and consumer needs.The idea is, design th

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，電子商務經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach  how to design the multimedia in the e-commerce.

description.zh: 幫助同學了解投資的理論與實務發展,訓練分析能力與培養正確投資觀念：投資學基礎、固定收益證券、權益證券、投資組合分析與管理、衍生性金融商品與風險管理
description.en: To introduce the developments of investment theories and practice to the students and try to enhance their analysis ability. ＊concepts of investment＊fixed-income securities＊equity securities＊portfolio theory and analysis＊financial derivatives and risk management

description.zh: 今日快速變遷的工商社會環境，使個人的工作和企業的生存都遭受莫大的危機。自由意識與人權觀念的高漲亦製造出許多個人與組織（企業或政府）之間的衝突。然而如果經由適當的管理和處理得宜，危機可以變為轉機，衝突的化解可以促進互信和瞭解。本課程首先介紹學生認識危機與衝突，發生的背景，分析危機與衝突的因素和癥結，教導學生處理危機與化解衝突的技巧與智識，並以實例介紹這些技巧的運用。
description.en: The fast changing society today has created a profound crisis to the jobs of an individual and to the survival of a business. The awareness of freedom and the concept of human rights have also created the conflicts between individuals and the organization (business or government). However, if managed properly, one can turn crisis into opportunity. The resolution of conflict can improve the mutual understanding. This course will introduce the students to recognize the background of crisis and conflict, analyze their key problems, teaches students the techniques and knowledge to manage crisis and to resolve conflict. These techniques will be illustrated with real world cases.

name.en: The Operation & Management In Real Estate Industry

description.zh: 由於不動產與生活息息相關，期予學生能充分瞭解，進而對其人生有著實質上的助益。內課程內容包括：1.不動產簡介、2.不動產相關產業的經營管理、3.不動產產業概論、4.不動產行銷、5.不動產經營概論、6.不動產投資學概論
description.en: Because the realty correlation about the life , hope student can understand than have substantial to life. The course include :1.The introduction of reality.2.The operation & Management of reality industry.3.The panorama of realty.4.Marketing in real estate industry.5. Management in real estate. 6.investement in real estate.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。溝通是人際關係中重要的手段，本課程提供學生對溝通知識的了解，並熟悉溝通的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋溝通的本質與觀念性架構，溝通的理論與模型，溝通的規劃、執行與控制，溝通的策略與技能。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion. It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development. The course discuss about the communication issue from business manager. It introduces the concepts of communication and the practice about communication. The core of the course include the knowledge of communication and structure、theory and models.

description.zh: 以管理經理的角色，經營組織運作系統，包括代理權與機構間的結合，課程包含1.以策略態勢，瞭解和定義零售和批發商概念。2.學習通路管理和行銷組合。3.學習通路規劃、統合和組織。4.學習通路評估與管理。
description.en: This course includes:1. Important concepts in retailing and wholesaling are defined and explained from a strategic perspective; 2.Study channel management and the marketing mix; 3.Study channel planning, coordination and organization; 4. Study channel assessment and control.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛製造課程包含車輛製造現場管理和車輛製造技術流程兩大部分，使學生了解整個汽車製造產業上的設備管理、量產管理和品質管理，以及汽車製造上所需的各種工藝技術，以觸發學生對汽車製造領域的興趣，進而擴大未來在汽車產業的服務機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the spot management and technical operation of vehicle manufacture. Students will understand the fields in facilities management, output management and quality control from this course. Furthermore, the aim of this course is to increase the students' interest and opportunity in the region of vehicle manufacture.

description.zh: 本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程著重介紹電腦輔助製造技術的概念與實作。內容包括NC基本概念，一般機械零件之NC與APT程式製作，複雜曲面零件之NC程式製作，CAM系統實習，群組技術電腦輔助製程規劃，電腦輔助製程規劃系統實習，電腦輔助生產規劃。
description.en: This course has been prepared for the comprehensive of Computer-aided manufacturing, with emphasis on the essentials of CNC technology and programming. Through the projects practice, the students are able to adapt to the techniques of CAM.

description.zh: 本課程講授參數式3D模型建模之技能，透過3D參數建模軟體將家具各零組件繪製，及組裝圖的繪製，目的在於培養學生具有數位化表達能力，以利於家具設計時造型之編修、工程檢討與設計管理。
description.en: The course is introducing the 3d modeling skill. Through learn the furniture part and assembly design drafting to develop the ability of digital design. It can take advantage of a Digital Prototyping workflow to design and build better furniture in less time.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣建築區分為七個文化期，依次概略介紹各文化期建築的一般特徵：(1) 臺灣建築史學史、分期及資料體系、(2) 史前建築：舊石器時代與新石器時代的建築、(3) 南島族群的建築：高山族的建築、(4) 南島族群的建築：平埔族的建築、(5) 荷西建築、(6) 漢式建築、(7) 清末洋式建築、(8) 日式建築、(9) 現代建築。
description.en: This course is based on historical development of architectures, actually Taiwan have seven cultural times, this course will introduce every topical of architectures, as followers：historical studies of Taiwan Architectures, early historical architecture, architectures of high mountain peoples, architectures of lower mountain peoples, architectures from Nederland and Spain, architectures from China, architectures from Europe, Japanese architectures, and modern architectures.

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

notes: 建都所日職與設計博合開

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 本課程從組織在企業管理中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以組織設計與資源策略來探討公司經營的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含外部環境、企業文化、組織設計、組織權力、組織政治、企業創新、資源整合策略。公司管理者學習後，面對多變化環境中，可做出最佳的組織經營決策。
description.en: The program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of organization design and resource strategy as they are used in a wide variety of settings in business. The topics covered in this course include: organization environment, organization culture, organization design, organization power, organization polices, organization innovation, and resource strategy. After taking the class, under the changeable environment, students should be able to make the best decisions of organization management.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en: The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務業的行銷與管理，主要內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務業創新（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）service innovation, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）service pricing.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理、化學。1. 醫學工程的領域與定義 2. 生醫訊號的介紹 3. 量測用醫療儀器的介紹 4. 生醫系統的介紹 5. 生醫材料的介紹 6. 臨床工程應用的介紹 7. 生醫感測器的介紹
description.en: 1. What is biomedical engineering? 2. Introduction of biosignals 3. Introduction of bioinstrumentation  4. Introduction of biomechanical systems 5. Introduction of biomaterials 6. Introduction of clinical engineering7. Introduction of biosensor

description.zh: 使學生熟悉智慧電網原理等相關知識。訓練學生具備運用智慧電網基礎、設計、分析與研發的能力。培養學生了解智慧電網與永續能源原理、觀念、背景、議題、應用與未來發展，實際瞭解智慧電網系統之運作。授課內容為：基本電力系統、智慧電網與電網運轉簡介、電網通訊、電網數據分析基礎、分散式電網與能源系統、智慧電網市場運轉
description.en: Introduction to the field of Smart Grid. The course will provide students with a working knowledge of fundamentals, design, analysis, and development of Smart Grid. This course will present and discuss principles, concepts, contexts, issues, applications and future developments of Smart grids and sustainable Energy integration. The course topics covered: 1.	Basics of Power Systems;2.	Introduction to smart grid and power grid operation;3.	Power grid communication and networking;4.	Elements of power networks and data analysis;5.	Elements of distributed energy resources (DER) and grid integration;6.	Economics and Market Operations.

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10.數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13.使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14.採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16.微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。
description.en: 1. Introduction; 2. Design of combinational systems; 3. Standard combinational modules; 4. Arithmetic combinational modules and networks5. Design of sequential network; 6. Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建   置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

name.zh: 資訊與通訊科技在工業工程之應用
name.en: Information and Communication Technologies for Industrial Engineering

description.zh: 智慧手機、智慧車、智慧家電、智慧電網、智慧化控制系統等，一場科技革命正熱鬧展開。看似單一產品的創新，背後其實有著更大的驅動力，那就是當行動通訊與網際網路結合後，催生出來的Mobile Internet新領域，所有資料都上網、所有物品都連網、所有人都掛網，個人到企業都必須做好準備，因此，當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，工業工程系責無旁貸的需將行動運算納入考量。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解雲端運算在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂服務導向的企業，以及提供進階之程式開發知識，與跨入3G最新手機開發平台，培養未來開發手機程式設計之技術實力，使學生具備獨立開發手機應用程式的能力。
description.en: This is an introduction course of mobile computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of mobile technology; and applications, 2. Location-based service 3. Could-based computing 4. Mobile applications; 5. Mobile programming

description.zh: 在電子化與網路化之經營環境下，生產製造與服務過程中，都會蒐集其中自動產生或人工輸入的資料。本課程學習在資訊平台上，以統計與分析方法以處理大量資料混雜時的管理決策問題，以萃取出有價值的資訊或內隱的知識，做為決策支援與管理之依據。除介紹問題基本特性，說明資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: Amount of data are collected automatically during manufacturing production and service process. This course aims to introduce how to apply big data analytic and statistical methods for decision making with amount of data and then extracting useful rules or patterns for decision support and management. In addition to lecturing, this course also training students how to analyze the data and learn problem solving techniques through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。基本概念、生產預測、產品/服務設計、生產製程與產能規劃、設施佈置、工作系統設計、生產計劃、生產管制、存貨管理、全面品質管理、設備預防保養。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Production Forecasting Product/Service Design, Production Processes and Capacity planning, Facility Layout, Job system Design, Production planning, Production Control, Inventory Control, Total Quality Management, Preventive Maintenance.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。基本概念、生產預測、產品/服務設計、生產製程與產能規劃、設施佈置、工作系統設計、生產計劃、生產管制、存貨管理、全面品質管理、設備預防保養。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Production Forecasting Product/Service Design, Production Processes and Capacity planning, Facility Layout, Job system Design, Production planning, Production Control, Inventory Control, Total Quality Management, Preventive Maintenance.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

notes: 日職合開且與大四、光電所合開，本所限12人

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 本課程介紹基本的金屬切削原理及其實務應用。本課程包含以下各項主題：(1)工具機與加工操作，(2)基本切削力學，(3)金屬切削溫度，(4)刀具壽命與刀具材料，(5)切削液與切削表面粗度，(6)金屬切削操作經濟學，(7)切屑控制，(8)研磨加工，(9)金屬切削實驗方法，(10)CAD/CAM與數控加工，(11)精密切削技術等。
description.en: This course is an introduction to basic metal-cutting principles and their practical applications. This course includes the following topics: (1) machine tools and machining operations, (2) fundamental metal-cutting mechanics, (3) temperature effect in metal machining, (4) tool lifetime and tool materials, (5) cutting coolants and surface roughness, (6) economics of meta-cutting operations, (7) chip control, (8) grinding, (9) experimental methods on metal machining, (10) CAD/CAM and numerical control (NC) machining, (11) techniques for precision machining.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 1.發展歷史與演進2.程序觀念3.非同步平行程序4.死結及無限等待5.主記憶體管理6.虛擬記憶體結構與管理7.處理器排程8.磁碟管理9.網路及系統安全
description.en: 1.History and evolution 2.Process concepts3.ASynchronous concurrent processes4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt5.Real storage management6.Virtual storage organization and management 7.Processor scheduling 8.Disk mansgement9.Network and security

description.zh: 產品創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業產品創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Production Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches to Production R&D innovation.    Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in Production R&D innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

description.zh: 本課程探討專案管理與領導統御之主要原則，內容涵蓋專案的觀念、工作分解結構、排程、預算編排與成本的監控、財務可行性分析、風險評估與監控、介面管理及領導統御的藝術等。
description.en: This course discusses the key principles of project management and leadership. Topics include project management concepts, work breakdown structure, scheduling, budgeting and cost monitoring, financial analysis, risk assessment and monitoring, interface management and the art of leadership.

notes: 另一位授課林逾先教授 2.0 (北科附工304室)

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構。將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. It can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於介紹個體經濟學理論及其相關應用，課程內容涵蓋主題包括：消費者行為與決策、不確定性與資訊不對稱、外部性與公共財、廠商行為與決策、產業型態與市場結構、生產要素市場、賽局理論、一般均衡與經濟效率、以及其他個體經濟的相關議題。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the main methods of systematic economic reasoning. It provides a rigorous treatment of microeconomic theory and its applications. Topics covered in the course will include the theories of consumer behavior; the economics of uncertainty and information; the economics of the public sector; firm behavior and the organization of industry; the economics of labor markets; game theory; and selected topics in general equilibrium and welfare economics.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 二甲、二乙合開/科研大樓240

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

description.zh: 本課程以COBOL程式語言為主，介紹程式語言基本資料處理的概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令的撰寫、程式的編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式的執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course is based on the COBOL programming language. It introduces the concept of basic data processing in the programming language, including basic input and output, program flow control, function application and other instruction writing, program editing, compilation, communication, and program execution and development.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教授就宏觀的角度，分析總體經濟環境，包括產出、失業率、通貨膨脹率、物價、利率與匯率等。課程分別就不同學派的理論，至貨幣與實質景氣循環等模型理論，說明其政策主張。
description.en: This course is designed to teach the overall economic environment from a macro perspective, including output, unemployment, inflation, prices, interest rates and exchange rates. The course explains the policy propositions on the theory of different schools, to the model theory of currency and substantive cycle.

description.zh: 本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本，內容包括二維製圖，三維製圖，修訂功能表，命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD Software (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the Tuitional examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc

notes: 電腦教室，Inventor 繪圖軟體

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意燃料及燃燒，基本熱傳理論，蒸汽動力廠，壓縮機，燃氣輪機，內燃機，汽油引擎，柴油引擎，冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 本課程目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager. Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

name.zh: 大型機電系統之設計與驗證
name.en: Design and verification of large-scale electrical and mechanical (E&M) system

description.zh: 內容包括需求管理、安全需求、工作分解架構、系統保證、功能方塊圖、失效模式與效應分析、災害分析與風險評估、界面管理、設計評估、型態管理、系統整合測試、安全證明、獨立安全評估及驗證與認證。
description.en: Requirements Management, Safety Requirement , Work Breakdown Structure, System Assurance, Functional Block Diagram, Failure Mode and Effects Analysis, Hazard Analysis and Risk Assessment, Interface Management, Design Review, Configuration Management, System Integration Test, Product Safety Case, Independent Safety Assessment, Verification and Validation.

description.zh: 氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源，致動器，控制元件及迴路,傳送,配管, 維護與安全。
description.en: Introduction of Pneumatic, Pneumatic elements Instruction, Electrical Parts for Pneumatic Control, Pneumatic Basic control circuit, Pneumatic Application control Circuit, Introduction of Hydraulic, Hydraulic control Element Instruction, Electrical Parts for Hydraulic Control, Hydraulic Basic Control Circuit, Hydraulic Application Control Circuit, and Pneumatic and Hydraulic Trouble Shooting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。  數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，數位積體電路設計，布氏代數與卡諾圖，組合電路設計與應用，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，多工器與解多工器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Circuits, Digital Systems and Coding, Basic Logic Operations,  Boolean Algebra and K-Map, Combinational Logic Circuits, Flip-Flop, Register, Sequential Circuit Design and Applications, Counter  and Timer, Multiplexer and Demultiplexer, Shit Register and Memory, Introduction to Micro-processor.

description.zh: 自動化機械相關機電界面等技術問題，內容包括自動化機構、致動器、感測器、控制器等之原理介紹，並配合機電整合設備，使同學由實習中獲得機電整合之概念。
description.en: Interface Techniques Concerning Automatic Machinery; Subjects Include Theory and Application Know-How of Mechanisms, Actuators, Sensors, And Controllers; Experiments also provided.

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

description.zh: 本課程除了讓學生透過論文閱讀與評析增進自我的評判技巧之外，也將透過數位學習相關國際研討會、國際期刊的審查標準來了解專家審查時所注意的面向。
description.en: The course is designed to assist students not only to enhance their criteria of reviewing articles, but also to understand the experts’ review standards in e-learning related international conferences and Journals.

description.zh: 1.積體電路的分類，2.積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS元件組成各種數位電路，6.以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7.系統分割，8.設計問題之探討，9.IC的構造， 10.設計方法，11.時序問題之探討，12.鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI之測試，14.有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15.專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

name.zh: 結構隔減震及耐震設計
name.en: Seismic Isolation and Earthquake Resistant Design

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹結構如何提高結構物承受地震力之能力，並探討各國有關結構隔減震及耐震設計規範，使同學了解其設計精神所在，更進一步訓練同學建立對於各種結構使用何種設計的判斷能力及設計技術。
本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

notes: 本課程為未通過英文畢業門檻之課程
